abyssal.name: Abyssal
effect: 20% chance to apply the Abyssal mutation 80% chance to increase fish weight by 1.3x
tips: Best paired with all-rounder rods without mutation passives, like the Rod of the Depths and Rod of The Forgotten Fang.
Worse version of Anomalous
Can be replaced with Quantum

blessed.name: Blessed
tips: Best paired with the Destiny Rod for the highest Sparkling/Shiny odds, works best during Night of The Luminous or Shiny Surge.

blood_reckoning.name: Blood Reckoning
effect: Sacrifice the player's health for a chance to apply the Sanguine (5×) mutation.
tips: Best for rods with strong stats or minimal money-making attributes.

breezed.name: Breezed
effect: During Windy: +100% luck, +20% Lure Speed, +10% progress speed
Outside of Windy: +50% luck, +10% Lure Speed, +10% progress speed
tips: Best paired with rods that have low luck, like the Midas Rod.
Can be replaced with Storming.

chaotic.name: Chaotic
effect: 8% chance for a fish to be Chaotic
multiplying its sell value by 8. Also stabs the fish occasionally
similar to the Trident Rod 's passive.
tips: Best paired with rods that have minimal money-making attributes (e.g. Great Dreamer Rod).
Works well with low resilience rods since it behaves similarly to Trident Rod's passive.

chronos.name: Chronos
effect: the rod has a 50% chance to stop the fish from moving for 3 seconds.
tips: Pairs best with rods requiring Perfect catches or with low resilience.

clever.name: Clever
tips: Better version of Insight.
Best paired with the Wisdom Rod for players who wish to level up fast.
Also useful for rods with fast lure speed like the Rod Of The Depths.

controlled.name: Controlled
tips: Can Be Replaced With Resilient Or Mystical
Best paired with rods that you want to have more control on.

divine.name: Divine
tips: Better version of Lucky.
Best paired with rods that have low luck, like the Midas Rod.
Can be replaced with Immortal.

flashline.name: Flashline
tips: Best paired with late-game or end-game rods such as the Ethereal Prism Rod

ghastly.name: Ghastly
tips: Best paired with rods that have minimal money-making attributes, like the Arctic Rod.
Can be replaced with Abyssal.

hasty.name: Hasty
tips: Better version of Swift.
Best paired with rods that have slow Lure Speeds, like the Steady Rod and Kings Rod.
And high Lure Speed rods like the Trident Rod, Poseidon Rod, Volcanic Rod and Heaven's Rod for instant catches.

insight.name: Insight
tips: Best paired with the Wisdom Rod for players who wish to level up fast.
Also useful for rods with fast lure speed like the Rod Of The Depths.
Can be replaced with Clever.

long.name: Long
effect: +50 Studs length to how far your rod can be cast
tips: Could be paired with rods that have low control, low resilience, and low length on the rod's cast. For most rods, this enchant is generally not recommended to use.

lucky.name: Lucky
tips: Best paired with rods that have low luck, like the Midas Rod.
Can be replaced with Divine.

momentum.name: Momentum
effect: Every Perfect Catch grants +2% Progress Speed
tips: Best with rods that benefit from Perfect catches (e.g. The Lost Rod, Luminescent Oath).
Can be paired with Seraphic Rod to increase effectiveness.

mutated.name: Mutated
tips: Best paired with rods that have a mutation passive for extra chances to getting it such as Mythical Rod, Rod Of The Eternal King and Voyager Rod.
Can be replaced with Abyssal.

noir.name: Noir
effect: 10% chance to catch Albino or Darkened fish
tips: Best paired with rods that have a mutation passive for extra chances for getting it such as Mythical rod, Rod of the eternal king and Voyager rod
Can be replaced with Abyssal.

quality.name: Quality
tips: Best paired with all-rounder rods where no specific stat is desired, like the No-Life Rod.

resilient.name: Resilient
tips: Best paired with rods that have low resilience, such as the Trident, Mythical, and Destiny Rod to name a few.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
effect: 3× higher chance to catch Enchant Relics
tips: Could be paired with
Rod Of The Exalted One
for highest
Exalted Relics
chances (~1/457).

scrapper.name: Scrapper
tips: Best paired with rods that consume large amounts of bait like the Mythical Rod or Kraken Rod.
Could also be paired with rods that have high lure speed, to reduce bait waste.

sea_king.name: Sea King
tips: Best paired with the Kings Rod to increase fish size by 65%.
Can be replaced with Sea Overlord.

steady.name: Steady
effect: Grants +20% progress speed when reeling a fish
tips: Best paired with rods that have low resilience and control.
Good for Fishes that reduce progress speed and for mass fishing like the Tempest Rod and the Challenger's Rod.
Can be replaced with Blessed Song.

storming.name: Storming
effect: +50% chance to catch Electric fish Outside of Rainy: +50% luck
tips: Better version of Breezed.
Best paired with rods that have low luck, like the Midas Rod.

swift.name: Swift
tips: Best paired with rods with low Lure Speeds, like the Steady Rod and Kings Rod.
Can be replaced with Hasty.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
tips: Best paired with rods that have decent stats but limited max weight, such as the Sunken Rod, Kraken Rod, Poseidon Rod and Tempest Rod.
Can be replaced with Herculean.

wormhole.name: Wormhole
effect: 80% chance to catch fish from a random location (Previously 45%)
tips: Well paired with Rod of The Depths, as its ghost passive can use it as well.

anomalous.name: Anomalous
effect: 20% Chance to catch a duplicate fish and have it be Anomalous (4.44x Sell Value) [Previously 10% chance and 1.1x sell value]
tips: Better version of Abyssal.
Best paired with all-rounder rods without mutation passives, like the Rod of the Depths and Rod of The Forgotten Fang.
Not recommended to use on rods with a chance to get a specific mutated fish, such as Heaven's Rod, Kraken Rod, and Ethereal Prism Rod.

herculean.name: Herculean
tips: Better version of Unbreakable.
Best paired with rods that have decent stats but limited max weight, such as the Sunken Rod, Poseidon Rod, Tempest Rod, Shamrock Rod and Kraken Rod.

immortal.name: Immortal
tips: Better version of Divine, Lucky and Steady combined.
Best paired with the Midas Rod or Rod Of The Eternal King.
Can also be paired with low luck and no progress speed multiplier.

invincible.name: Invincible
effect: Allows the rod to fish in the Roslit Volcano & Brine Pool
tips: Could be paired with Heaven's Rod, Rod of The Eternal King or Avalanche Rod to catch rare fish like Inferno Wood and Spectral Serpent.
Useless on Reinforced Rod and Magma Rod.
Necessary to use this enchant on the Duskwire rod due to its negative weight limit.

mystical.name: Mystical
tips: Better version of Resilient (+35% resilience)
Best paired with rods that have low resilience, especially the Trident Rod, Mythical Rod, and Destiny Rod.

piercing.name: Piercing
effect: Adds +15% Progress Speed, Passive visual on control bar produces colored slashes depending on the background color of the rod in the equipment bag.
tips: Could be paired with rods that have low
control
or low
resilience
, like the
Nocturnal Rod
and
Destiny Rod

quantum.name: Quantum
effect: 25% chance for fish to be Subspace
tips: Best enchantment for money-making.
Best paired with all-rounder rods like the Rod of the Depths, Kraken Rod, Tempest Rod, No-Life Rod and Rod of The Forgotten Fang.
Better version of Abyssal.
Also not recommended to use on rods with a chance to get a specific mutated fish, such as Heaven's Rod, Kraken Rod, and Ethereal Prism Rod.

sea_overlord.name: Sea Overlord
tips: Better version of Sea King (+30% fish size)
Best paired with the Kings Rod or Poseidon Rod (Due to king's blessing passive)

cryogenic.name: Cryogenic
effect: A small chance to fully freeze a lured fish
tips: Best paired with rods that have low resilience or control to better help catch the fish.

glittered.name: Glittered
tips: Useful when hunting for Shiny or Sparkling fishes.

overclocked.name: Overclocked
effect: Increases Progress Speed by 5% for any fish (Includes Scylla and Apex fish.)
tips: Best paired with rods that have good resilience to catch Apex fish and the Scylla.

sea_prince.name: Sea Prince
tips: Best paired with the Kings Rod to increase fish size by 45%.
Worse version of Sea King and Sea Overlord.

tenacity.name: Tenacity
effect: Increases Progress Speed by +20% for every reel snapped in a row (stacks to inf%)
tips: Best paired with Rod of The Forgotten Fang.

tryhard.name: Tryhard
tips: Best paired with rods with high control such as Brick Rod and Polaris Serenade.

wise.name: Wise
tips: Worse version of Insight and Clever.
Best paired with Wisdom Rod for players who wish to level up fast.
Also useful for rods with fast lure speed like Rod Of The Depths.

rage.name: Rage
effect: 40% chance per fish movement to stab for +8% progress
tips: Best paired with Cerulean Fang Rod for maximum stab chances or any rod that does not have a stabbing ability but has high luck.
Useful for increasing stab chances when catch for fish with forced progress speeds.
This enchantment reduces resilience and thus, stabs fish more.

greed.name: Greed
tips: Best paired with rods that have an already high lure speed and progress speed.

fractured.name: Fractured
tips: Better version of Tryhard.
Best paired with rods that have an already high control like the Brick Rod and Polaris Serenade.

pharaoh's_curse.name: Pharaoh's Curse
tips: Worse version of Quantum

putrid.name: Putrid
tips: It is not recommended to use this enchant as it only has debuffs.

weak.name: Weak
tips: It is not recommended to use this enchant as it only has debuffs.

wobbly.name: Wobbly
tips: It is not recommended to use this enchant as it only has debuffs.

blessed_song.name: Blessed Song
tips: Better version of Steady and Immortal.
Could be paired with Tempest Rod for +55% Progress Speed, or preferably Challenger's Rod for +60% Progress Speed.
Best paired with the Ethereal Prism Rod.
Could be paired with the Great Rod Of Oscar due to its +30% Progress Speed buff adding +70% Progress Speed with this enchant on.
